(WATCHING)

observation noun
(NOTICING)
B2 [ U ] the fact that you notice or see something: She has remarkable powers of observation (= is very good at noticing things).
C1 [ C ] formal a remark about something that you have noticed: The book is full of interesting observations on/about the nature of musical composition. May I make an observation?
